sidekick.cant_swap: This server does not support Creative+
button.sidekick.power.no_pickup.desc: Disable pickup of stray items on the ground, to keep your inventory clear.
button.sidekick.power.instakill.desc: Greatly increase your punch damage to get rid of pesky mobs without carrying a sword around.
button.sidekick.power.damage.desc: Enable damage and show your health bar. You still can't die, except by the usual things that kill Creative players.
button.sidekick.power.no_break_delay.des: Disable the Creative break delay, to break blocks like a gold pick through netherrack.
button.sidekick.power.fullbright.desc: Ignore lighting, making everything appear fully lit. Does not change the fog.
button.sidekick.power.noclip.desc: Freely pass through blocks like a Spectator.
button.sidekick.power.reach.desc: Increase your reach from 4-ish blocks to 12 blocks.
button.sidekick.power.free_flight.desc: Fly like old Classic mods, rather than the momentum-based vanilla system. Select full-3D or plane-lock in Options.
sidekick.option.plane_lock.name: Plane Lock
sidekick.option.plane_lock.desc: Ignore your vertical facing when moving in Free Flight mode, similar to vanilla flight.
sidekick.option.pick_swap.name: Pick-Swap
sidekick.option.pick_swap.desc: Items that are displaced by pickblock are put into the extended inventory for later use, rather than deleted.
sidekick.option.fall_damage.name: Fall Damage
sidekick.option.fall_damage.desc: Take fall damage when health is enabled, if the server supports it.
sidekick.option.disable_animations.name: Disable Animations
sidekick.option.disable_animations.desc: Disable the transitions and animations, for maximum no-nonsense efficiency.
sidekick.option.ui_sounds.name: UI Sounds
sidekick.option.ui_sounds.desc: Play audible feedback where vanilla doesn't.
sidekick.option.hints.name: Hints
sidekick.option.creative_tabs.name: Creative Tabs
sidekick.option.creative_tabs.desc: Show the vanilla creative tabs to the right. May be undesirable for an item sidebar workflow.
sidekick.option.delete_mode.name: Destroy Mode
sidekick.option.delete_mode.desc: Shift-clicking the Destroy Item button enters Destroy Mode instead of deleting everything. Disable for vanilla behavior.
sidekick.option.dark_mode.name: Night Owl
sidekick.option.dark_mode.desc: Make the Sidekick GUI darker, instead of pure vanilla style.
sidekick.power_unsupported: The server you are connected to does not support this power.
sidekick.storage.error.trailer.2: Changes will be lost on reconnect
msg.sidekick.wrong_mode: You need to be in Creative+ to do this
